channel.title: Changeing starting area [317] not [508]
channel.description: ok so, i got a good server source and i would like to move the strating area to edgeville, to make it a pking server. No i DO NOT want to get another server, and yes i have searched google numerous times. Iv read the "[508] how to chage login area." and it didnt help. Im not a idiot, but im cluelesss with this. If your not sure please donnt post "r et in' cleint.java?"

item.title: Changeing starting area [317] not [508]
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

In Player.java search the coordinates of your starting position in this format:

toX = XCOORDINATE; toY = YCOORDINATE; Don’t search that, replace the XCOORDINATE and the YCOORDINATE with the correct coordinates.

If it’s a basic 317 source in client.java search the X coordinate of the starting position.

Read full topic
